name: CollideyScope
description:
In the game of CollideyScope there is only one task; make everything the same.
Use the Arrow Keys to rotate the units to their correlating directions until they all the same. But do so before the collide!

This is a submission project for 
-100 Lines of Code GameMaker Jam-

CollideyScope consists of: 
- 5 Sprites, with 3 sub-images each.
- 1 Background Image
- 3 Sounds
- 2 Objects
- 2 Fonts (For play in browser)
- And only 87 lines of code ^_^

TM2D Productions
- We like making games, and stuff.
